entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
